item.title: Need help from an experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Mutant138 Mutant138
item.description:
@Mutant138 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:11, topic:407275”][quote author=Mutant138 link=topic=508559.msg3689557#msg3689557 date=1312040006]

if (command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Try that.

You forgot player command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && c.playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

This has given me the following error :

[/quote]
You have to declare those variables.
How about?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && c.playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/quote]
That has given me the 1 error now
src\server\model\players\packets\commands.java:71: cannot find symbol symbol : variable extraCh
location: class server.model.players.packets.commands
extraCb += combat;
^
1 error
press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from an experienced coder

item.title: Need help from an experienced coder

if (command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Try that.

You forgot player command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && c.playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
[/quote]
This has given me the following error :
[/quote]
You have to declare those variables.
How about?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && c.playerRights >= 2) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

item.dc:creator: @Mutant138 Mutant138
item.description:
@Mutant138 wrote:

ok, i set this piece of coding, and i’m not going to explain it, if you can help me with the problem then you should be able to read it and understand what it says… :

c.getPA().startTeleport(3182, 3441, 0, "modern"); } if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

the compiler is giving me this error…

Any Help is Appreciated, contact me on msn if you think you can teamveiwer the situation: mutant138@hotmail.com
